summary: Use this api to get one shop discount activity detail
description: Use this api to get one shop discount activity detail

query.name: discount_status
query.description: The status filter for retriveing discount list. Available value: upcoming/ongoing/expired/all.

query.name: page_no
query.description: Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. if data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call.

query.name: page_size
query.description: If many items are available to retrieve, you may need to call GetDiscountsList multiple times to retrieve all the data. Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the Pagination filters to control the maximum number of entries (<= 100) to retrieve per page (i.e., per call), the offset number to start next call. This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data.

query.name: update_time_from
query.description: The update_time_from and update_time_to fields specify a date range for retrieving orders (based on the discount update time). The maximum date range that may be specified with the update_time_from and update_time_to fields is 30 days.

query.name: update_time_to
query.description: The update_time_from and update_time_to fields specify a date range for retrieving orders (based on the discount update time). The maximum date range that may be specified with the update_time_from and update_time_to fields is 30 days.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking.

schema.name: discount_list
schema.description: The discounts created in this shop.

schema.name: start_time
schema.description: The time when discount activity start.

schema.name: end_time
schema.description: The time when discount activity end.

schema.name: discount_id
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a discount activity.

schema.name: source
schema.description: Source of the discount. 7: live stream, 1: admin, 0: others

schema.name: more
schema.description: This is to indicate whether the item list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest of items.

error_codes.message: There is no access_token in query.
There is no partner_id in query.
There is no sign in query.
